md:LocalizedInfo.md:TitleSort: Little House On The Prairie: Season 8 Episode 3 Growin' Pains
md:LocalizedInfo.md:Summary190: After adopting two more children, Charles and Caroline must adjust to managing five young children. The family tension mounts when James runs away after getting into an argument with Albert
